body:
Honestly this update is possibly one of the nicest additions I've seen to Avicus.

I saw the https://avicus.net/revisions page and I find it great that the devs are moving to a more consistent development rather than one huge update every year.

One question though, could there be a 'Retired' badge on my postbit like there is for donor and staff ranks?
